name: Flight Sim World: Kahului Air Mission Pack
detailed_description:
Aloha and welcome to Kahului Air! In this challenging mission pack, you have just landed your dream job. Over the course of a week, you’ll get to experience what it’s like to be working at a small charter outfit transporting cargo and ferrying passengers around the Hawaiian Islands.

During your travels you’ll encounter various challenges, such as being the co-pilot on a familiarization flight with Paul Claxton, the no-nonsense chief pilot, taking charge of delivering goods with Katherine, Kahului Air’s experienced co-pilot, as well as dealing with poor weather, keeping passengers happy and dealing with the odd emergency.

Be sure to brush up on your Instrument flying skills as you’ll need to know your way around a GPS!

Features:

  • Seven story-led missions based around five tropical locations:
  • Kahului
  • Kalaupapa
  • Molokai
  • Honolulu
  • Hana
  • Pilot and co-pilot roles
  • Exclusive liveries for the Piper PA-46 Malibu Mirage and Piper PA-34 Seneca
  • Airport traffic featuring officially licensed AI airliners (only in mission)
  • New Cargo model variant of the PA-34 Seneca

The release of this mission pack also brings an additional graphics pack to the Pro Mission Tool, opening a suite of new library objects to mission creators.

short_description: Aloha and welcome to Kahului Air!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: AMD APU Kaveri A10-7850K or Intel Core i3 6100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon R9 Fury or GeForce GTX 970 (4 GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
  • Additional Notes: System requirements are subject to changes during optimisation process.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7, Intel i7 6700k
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon R9 Fury or GeForce GTX 970 (4GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
  • Additional Notes: System requirements are subject to changes during the optimisation process
